tam.method: Top-down analysis using the total projected revenue of the Indian technology sector as the TAM, assuming Ctruh is an India-focused tech company.

sources.quote: India's technology sector is expected to grow at a higher pace this fiscal year... reaching $282.6 billion, industry body Nasscom said on Monday.

assumptions: Ctruh targets a specific sub-segment of the Indian tech market, such as enterprise AI or digital transformation solutions.
This serviceable market is estimated to be 8% of the total Indian technology market (TAM).
The company's products and services are tailored for the needs of this specific segment within India.
Assumes Ctruh can realistically capture 1% of its SAM within the next 3-5 years.
This capture rate is based on projected sales and marketing efforts, product-market fit, and the competitive landscape.
The go-to-market strategy is focused on acquiring a specific customer profile within the SAM.

delta_vs_deck.notes: No pitch deck was provided for Ctruh to compare against.
